title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama GitHub repository providing the core CLI and server to pull, create, and run large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client library for the Ollama API, published to npm as "ollama".

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for the Ollama API, published to PyPI as "ollama".

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) enabling Ollama models as LangChain LLMs.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama models, installable via Docker or pip (ollama-webui).

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java client library for Ollama, available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper around the Ollama REST API with conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that exposes Ollama models as slash commands in any Discord server.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem (ollama-rb) providing a simple client for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Ready-to-use Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, and Open WebUI with GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration package allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial .NET/C# client library for Ollama, distributed via NuGet as OllamaSharp.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-curated recipes and examples for using Ollama with LangChain, LlamaIndex, RAG, agents, etc.
